formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: Functional specification revealed a possible ambiguity in the description of requirement 21. Recommend the following:

listitem.simpara: That requirement 21 be changed to clearly indicate that only fully closed namespaces are accepted; that is, only accept namespaces with no free variable references.
Additionally, a new requirement prohibiting the use of the ⌶ -beam should be included.
A new requirement prohibiting the use of the ⍎ function should be added.
Requirement 4 should be amended to specify D-fns, rather than Co-Dfns programs.
The new additions to the D-fns languages introduced by Co-Dfns should be added and fully defined.
It should be remarked that no assignment which changes the overall nameclass of a variable is allowed.
A requirement detailing the unsupported operators should be added. These operators include the & operator as well as the ⍠ operator.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: No semantic change is introduced based on the intention of the design, and are at an early enough stage so as to not affect more than the functional specification, so this should be implemented.
